availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Wolf (Richland County, IL, circuit court clerk)

body.p: Richland County, Illinois, surveyor and circuit court clerk. Cumberland County, Pennsylvania, native. Son of Mary Wolf. Married to Margaret Wolf. Father of William H. Wolf. Surveyor in Richland County, Illinois, in 1860. Circuit court clerk in Richland County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Richland County, Olney, p. 29.
"John Wolf Jr. (1817-1897)," Find A Grave, Memorial 35323994, accessed March 30, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35323994.
KYR-0001-006-0001.
